name: places/ChIJ7dNP6odYwokRINMPpdeGi9E
formattedAddress: 80 Riverside Dr, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 80 Riverside Dr, New York, NY 10024-5725, USA

originalText.text: I swear The Rushmore makes me "rush" home every single time! Lol. Maybe its because I just moved here and its taking me some time to get used to. I was previously living in Brooklyn, where I've been living all my live. My parents sold their house and moved to Florida and I moved into boyfriend's condo (who is now my husband). Working in Lower Manhattan for nearly a decade led me to a higher-paying position in Midtown about four years ago, a year after giving birth to my three year old son. Me and husband decided eight months ago, that it was time to get a bigger and better apartment so we chose The Rushmore. My son absolutely loves the playroom, my husband enjoys the billiard room and I especially enjoy the spa and lounge. Our 2BR apartment is filled granite and marble features and the kitchen is to die for!
